QuestData.Title: Bad Intentions
QuestData.Description: Suramar is lost.$b$bOur leaders struck a dark bargain, accepting the Legion as our allies. We were meant to be heroes, guardians - the people resting here. We are not like them any more. I cannot live with them.$b$bBut cut off from the Nightwell, we wither and devolve into a mindless existence. An existence without release or dignity, as you can see even here...$b$bI rejected both of these options and found myself here. I will find a third way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Thaedris Feathersong in Tel'anor.
QuestData.RewardText: Honeyed words from a stranger. While comforting, they do not shake my resolve. Come, at this rate I will wither before we are through.
